description: When it comes to demanding ski touring ascents in the biting cold, the swisswool col becchei hybrid Jacket provides optimum protection and maximum freedom of movement. Quilted, elastic and windresistant Tec stretch material is used as the outer fabric of this lightweight insulated jacket. To provide Maximum protection against the wind and cold, insulation inserts made from 60g swisswool have Been set into the front and the upper arms. The merino naturetec light inserts in the hood, sleeves And waist area are extremely breathable and elastic yet wind-resistant. Tasmanian merino wool On the inside guarantees optimum climate regulation and a high degree of comfort. Other features such As elastic inserts in the hood and cuffs, and backpack-compatible side pockets round off this hybrid jacket Perfectly. As with the rest of the col becchei line, the col becchei hybrid jacket is pfc-free and Climate-neutral.
name: Col Becchei Jacket - Mens
